topics.body:
"@Evident Disaster":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53e841b263687231d95c0100#post_53e841b263687231d95c0100
[bq="Evident Disaster"]Okay who here watches the news? Or for that matter keeps up to date with everything in the world? Cause there's a lot of crap which happens, and I'd like to know what you guys think.
Unless of course you're like me who just doesn't give a crap often and just accepts the way the world is. [/bq]
I do.

Tl:dr; ISIS is fucking over the middle east; ISIS will probably have their own country ten years from now independent of Iraq and Syria which everyone is going to nickname "#1 shithole of the world" and Syria will be nicknamed "#2 shithole of the world".  People are evacuating Syria and ISIS controlled areas as fast as humanly possible to the point that's probably how that shit's going to end is that almost all the civilian population will have left(10k people are leaving a day so in 5-10 years Syria will be a metaphorical ghost town).

Russia fucked up by supporting the rebels in Ukraine and the rebels are losing control of large amounts of land to the point where realistically speaking the only city they can maintain control of in the long run is a town on the border with Russia anyhow.  Russia was caught shelling into Ukraine.  Russia fucked up diplomatically.  The Ukraine rebels fucked up and accidentally shot a civilian aircraft and have lost a ton of support.  Russia's boner for conquering countries got the cold shower treatment and will probably not be able to take control of anymore areas of land.


Ebola in northwest africa is spreading faster than they can quarantine it.  Traditionally ebola kills faster than it can infect, but due to extremely poor standards of living in the countries it's infecting it's spreading at a rate of about 20% a week.  It's enough of a "oh shit" scenario that the borders are getting shut down and sooner rather than later travel will be suspended.  More than likely it won't cross the Sahara, but if it does gg africa.  Liberia, Sierre Leone and such are probably fucked cause the quarantine procedures are constantly being breached due to the country not having the facilities to contain the outbreak.  It probably won't spread further than africa.  Worst case scenario is if it spreads beyond the Sahara we're talking at least a couple ten million dead; if it doesn't spread beyond the sahara we're talking only a couple hundred thousand to a couple million dead.  The vast majority of the deaths will be in Africa though.

Robot penises: explanation cybernetics are coming sooner rather than later, but not in the way you expect cause robot organs are really difficult but legs and organs are much easier.
